detail_desc: Straight-cut, cropped shirt in lightweight washed cotton denim with a collar and concealed button band down the front. Yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace-covered shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed, stretch denim with space for a growing tummy. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and tapered legs.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Double-layered hat in a fine knit with motifs and appliqués. Pompom with a bell on top.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Hat in braided paper straw.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect, and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets. Tapered legs, leg pockets with a concealed zip, and a zip at the front of the hems.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Polo-neck collar in a soft rib knit.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey. Regular waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Calf-length skirt in washed cotton denim. Regular waist with a button at the top and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, wrapover front with a concealed, diagonal zip, side pockets and a patch pocket at one side. Unlined.
Nylon laptop case with a chunky zip, one outer compartment and two inner compartments in big hole mesh. Size 1x24x33 cm. Fits laptops up to 13”.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dungaree dress in sturdy washed cotton denim with wide straps that taper at the back and fasten with a button. Zip fly and button, side pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fake flap pockets at the back.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Skirt in an airy cotton weave with an elastic waistband in contrasting colours and front pockets. Lined.
Metal earrings. Two thicker pairs and two thinner pairs. Diameter approx. 2 cm.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Velour mules with pointed toes and a decorative twisted detail at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and patterned soles.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back. Recycled polyester lining and filling. The polyester content of the jacket’s outer layer is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, lightly crêped satin with a boat neck and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the shoulders and back of the neck. Short cap sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped chest pocket in contrasting colour woven fabric, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated trim in a contrasting colour around the collar, cuffs and hem.

Set with a sleeveless romper suit and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned romper suit with a kangaroo pocket, press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch, and ribbed hems. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Long kimono in satin with lace embroidery, dropped shoulders and wide, short sleeves. Narrow ties on the inside and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Padded nylon jacket with a detachable, lined hood and lined sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, and a high slit at one side of the hem.
Jumper knitted in soft wool containing some recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Platform sandals with open toes, crossover foot straps and an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 10 cm.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed turtle neck, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.
Trainers in jersey with imitation leather details, a print motif, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuit and a pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a text print on the front and press-studs at the sides and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood, flap pockets and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Short beach kaftan in airy, patterned chiffon with ties at the sides. No fasteners.

Long, padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood, a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the waist and elastication and adjustable tabs with buttons at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to provide extra width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
Earrings with hoop pendants in metal covered in sparkly stones. Length 6 cm.
Thin tights with a spotted pattern and an elasticated waist.
Fully-fashioned hi-top trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, ribbed shaft and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Patterned soles.

Short dress in jersey with short, gathered puff sleeves and a deep V-neck with a drawstring at the front to create a gentle draped effect over the bust. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a polo neck and long sleeves with frilled trims. Overlocked edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Metal earrings with a pendant in the shape of a Christmas bauble. Length 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with a cotton sweatband. Width of brim 9 cm.
Fisherman’s hat in cotton twill with a small appliqué. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a concealed drawstring at the waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-stud.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short sleeves with ribbed trims.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in airy jersey crêpe with a detachable tie belt at the waist, V-neck, wrapover top and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Short dolman sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs. Unlined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a wide flounced trim that continues down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Shiny metal hair grips in various designs.
